Frequently Asked Questions

How quickly can you respond to service calls?

We typically respond within 30 minutes and can be on-site within 1-2 hours for most locations in the Dallas-Fort Worth area.

Do you offer same-day repair service?

Yes! Most smartphone and tablet repairs can be completed the same day, often within 1-2 hours depending on the issue and parts availability.

Is there a charge for estimates?

No, all estimates and diagnostics are completely free. We'll assess your device and provide a detailed quote at no charge.

What areas do you serve?

We serve the entire Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex including all major cities and suburbs. Mobile service is available throughout the area.

Do you warranty your repair work?

Yes, all repairs come with our comprehensive warranty covering both parts and labor. Warranty terms vary by service type.

Can you repair water-damaged devices?

Yes, we specialize in water damage recovery. Time is critical, so contact us immediately for emergency water damage service.

Emergency Repair Service

Device emergency? Water damage? Need immediate help? We're available 24/7 for critical repairs.
